Add custom report pages and visualizations to your analytics within the {{< var validmind.platform >}}.

To create custom reports, you'll need to complete these two steps in sequence:

1. [Add a custom analytic page](#add-custom-analytics-pages)
2. [Add a custom visualization](#add-custom-visualizations)

::: {.callout}
You can also add any of the report widgets to your personal dashboard.[^1]
:::

::: {.attn}
